wutpat

?@, wutpat, [%wtpt p=wing q=twig r=twig] is a synthetic hoon that produces q if p is an atom, r otherwise.

Definition

++  twig  
  $%  [%wtpt p=wing q=twig r=twig]
  ==

Regular form (tall)

?@  p
  q
r

Regular form (wide)

?@(p q r)

Expansion

++  open
  ^-  twig
  ?-  gen
    [%wtpt *]  [%wtcl [%wtts [%axil %atom %$] p.gen] q.gen r.gen]
  ==
